glsa.title: nbd: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in nbd, which could lead to remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: nbd is a userland client/server for kernel network block device.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in nbd. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: nbd allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) or the execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All nbd users should upgrade to the latest version:
